name: db-readings
body:
### Welcome!
A list of papers essential to the systems side of databases.

### Database Internals

### Systems Design
* A History and Evaluation of System R http://www.cs.ubc.ca/~rap/teaching/504/2010/readings/history-of-system-r.pdf

### Database Reading Lists
A number of schools have their own reading lists for graduate students in databases.

* Berkeley: http://www.eecs.berkeley.edu/GradAffairs/CS/Prelims/db.html
* Stanford: http://infolab.stanford.edu/db_pages/infoqual.html
* Wisconsin: http://www.cs.wisc.edu/sites/default/files/db.reading.pdf

### Support or Contact
File an issue on github or email rxin@cs.berkeley.edu for feedback and/or questions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
